td.content: s:patient presents with Liver for about 3 weeks. he is a 36 YO M aerospace engineer. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 55.7 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Cirrhosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to internal medicine.

s:a 36 YO white male aerospace engineer presents with Liver. he is having symptoms 6-7 times a week, in spite of treatment. he drinks alcohol heavily for the past 4 years he has a history of smoking o:Height 166 cm, Weight 57.5 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Cirrhosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered CT Abdomen.

s:pt complains of Liver and other medical problems. NKDA. patient is a male aerospace engineer aged 37 yrs. consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking o:Height 167 cm, Weight 57.9 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Cirrhosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to internal medicine.
